   20: 
   21: %%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   22: %%%
   23: %%% Define to run outside of test server
   24: %%%
   25: %%% -define(STANDALONE,1).
   26: %%%
   27: %%%
   28: %%% Define for debug output
   29: %%%
   30: %%% -define(debug,1).
   31: 
   32: -module(trace_call_time_SUITE).
   33: 
   34: %% Exported end user tests
   35: 
   36: -export([seq/3, seq_r/3]).
   37: -export([loaded/1, a_function/1, a_called_function/1, dec/1, nif_dec/1, dead_tracer/1,
   38:         return_stop/1,reset/1,catch_crash/1]).
   39: 
   40: -define(US_ERROR, 10000).
   41: -define(R_ERROR, 0.8).
   42: -define(SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME, 10).
   43: 
   44: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   45: %% Result examination macros
   46: 
   47: -define(CT(P,MFA),{trace,P,call,MFA}).
   48: -define(CTT(P, MFA),{trace_ts,P,call,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   49: -define(RF(P,MFA,V),{trace,P,return_from,MFA,V}).
   50: -define(RFT(P,MFA,V),{trace_ts,P,return_from,MFA,V,{_,_,_}}).
   51: -define(RT(P,MFA),{trace,P,return_to,MFA}).
   52: -define(RTT(P,MFA),{trace_ts,P,return_to,MFA,{_,_,_}}).
   53: 
   54: -ifdef(debug).
   55: -define(dbgformat(A,B),io:format(A,B)).
   56: -else.
   57: -define(dbgformat(A,B),noop).
   58: -endif.
   59: 
   60: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
   61: 
   62: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   63: 
   64: %% When run in test server.
   65: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0,
   66:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   67:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   68:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2]).
   69: -export([basic/1, on_and_off/1, info/1,
   70:          apply_bif_bug/1, abb_worker/1,
   71:          disable_ongoing/1,
   72: 	 pause_and_restart/1, scheduling/1, called_function/1, combo/1, 
   73: 	 bif/1, nif/1]).
   74: 
   75: 
   76: suite() ->
   77:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   78:      {timetrap, {minutes, 10}}].
   79: 
   80: all() ->
   81:     trace_sessions:all().
   82: 
   83: groups() ->
   84:     trace_sessions:groups(testcases()).
   85: 
   86: testcases() ->
   87:     [basic, on_and_off, info, pause_and_restart, scheduling,
   88:      disable_ongoing,
   89:      apply_bif_bug,
   90:      combo, bif, nif, called_function, dead_tracer, return_stop,
   91:      reset,
   92:      catch_crash].
   93: 
   94: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   95:     trace_sessions:init_per_suite(Config).
   96: 
   97: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   98:     trace_sessions:end_per_suite(Config).
   99: 
  100: init_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  101:     trace_sessions:init_per_group(Group, Config).
  102: 
  103: end_per_group(Group, Config) ->
  104:     trace_sessions:end_per_group(Group, Config).
  105: 
  106: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  107:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
  108:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
  109:     erlang_trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
  110:     timer:now_diff(now(),now()),
  111:     trace_sessions:init_per_testcase(Config).
  112: 
  113: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) ->
  114:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false,
  115:                          [local,meta,call_time,call_count,call_memory]),
  116:     erlang_trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time,call_count]),
  117:     erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  118:     trace_sessions:end_per_testcase(Config).
  119: 
  120: 
  121: erlang_trace(A,B,C) ->
  122:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace(A,B,C).
  123: 
  124: erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C) ->
  125:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_pattern(A,B,C).
  126: 
  127: erlang_trace_info(A,B) ->
  128:     trace_sessions:erlang_trace_info(A,B).
  129: 
  130: 
  131: %% Tests basic call time trace
  132: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  133:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  134:     M = 700,
  135:     %%
  136:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  137:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  138:     Pid = setup(),
  139:     {L,  T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  140:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  141:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  142: 
  143:     {Lr, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> (X+1) end) end),
  144:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq,   3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  145:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Pid, 1, 0, 0}], T2/M),
  146:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  147:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  148: 
  149:     %%
  150:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  151:     Pid ! quit,
  152:     ok.
  153: 
  154: %% Tests disable ongoing call_time traced function
  155: disable_ongoing(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  156:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  157:     %%
  158:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_a, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  159:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  160:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_c, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  161:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_d, 0}, true, [call_time]),
  162: 
  163:     Pid = setup(),
  164: 
  165:     Self = self(),
  166:     Pid  ! {self(), execute, fun() -> disong_a(Self) end},
  167: 
  168:     c_ready = receive M1 -> M1 end,
  169: 
  170:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,disong_b,1}, false, [call_time]),
  171: 
  172:     Pid ! go_on,
  173: 
  174:     {Pid, answer, _} = receive M2 -> M2
  175:                        after 1000 -> timeout end,
  176: 
  177:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  178:     Pid ! quit,
  179:     ok.
  180: 
  181: disong_a(Pid) ->
  182:     ForceStack = id(a),
  183:     disong_b(Pid),
  184:     disong_d(),
  185:     ForceStack.
  186: 
  187: disong_b(Pid) ->
  188:     ForceStack = id(b),
  189:     disong_c(Pid),
  190:     ForceStack.
  191: 
  192: disong_c(Pid) ->
  193:     Pid ! c_ready,
  194:     receive
  195:         go_on -> ok
  196:     end.
  197: 
  198: disong_d() ->
  199:     ok.
  200: 
  201: id(I) ->
  202:     I.
  203: 
  204: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  205: 
  206: 
  207: %% "Tests turning trace parameters on and off
  208: on_and_off(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  209:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  210:     M = 100,
  211:     %%
  212:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  213:     Pid = setup(),
  214:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, seq, [1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end]}),
  215:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  216: 
  217:     N = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  218:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  219:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  220: 
  221:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  222:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  223:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  224: 
  225:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  226:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  227:     {L, _T4} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  228:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, false, none),
  229:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [], none),
  230:     {Lr, T5} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  231:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T5),
  232: 
  233:     N = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  234:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  235:     {Lr, _T6} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq_r(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  236:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, false, none),
  237:     L = lists:reverse(Lr),
  238:     %%
  239:     Pid ! quit,
  240:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  241:     ok.
  242: 
  243: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  244: 
  245: %% Tests the trace_info BIF
  246: info(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  247:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  248:     %%
  249:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,3}, true, [call_time]),
  250:     {call_time,[]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  251:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  252:     {call_time,[]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  253:     {all,[_|_]=L} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  254:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, L),
  255:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  256:     {call_time,[]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  257:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, false, [call_time]),
  258:     {call_time,false} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, call_time),
  259:     {all,false} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq,3}, all),
  260:     %%
  261:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  262:     ok.
  263: 
  264: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  265: 
  266: %% Tests pausing and restarting call time counters
  267: pause_and_restart(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  268:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  269:     M = 100,
  270:     Pid = setup(),
  271:     %%
  272:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  273:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  274:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  275:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  276:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, pause, [call_time]),
  277:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T1),
  278:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  279:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T2),
  280:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq,'_'}, restart, [call_time]),
  281:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [], none),
  282:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, fun() -> seq(1, M, fun(X) -> X+1 end) end),
  283:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq, 3}, [{Pid,M,0,0}], T3),
  284:     %%
  285:     Pid ! quit,
  286:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  287:     ok.
  288: 
  289: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  290: 
  291: %% Tests in/out scheduling of call time counters
  292: scheduling(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  293:     P  = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  294:     M  = 1000000,
  295:     Np = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  296:     F  = 12,
  297: 
  298:     %% setup load processes
  299:     %% (single, no internal calls)
  300: 
  301:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,loaded,2}, true, [call_time]),
  302: 
  303:     Pids     = [setup() || _ <- lists:seq(1, F*Np)],
  304:     {_Ls,T1} = execute(Pids, {?MODULE,loaded,[M]}),
  305:     [Pid ! quit || Pid <- Pids],
  306: 
  307:     %% logic dictates that each process will get ~ 1/F of the schedulers time
  308: 
  309:     {call_time, CT} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,loaded,2}, call_time),
  310: 
  311:     lists:foreach(fun (Pid) ->
  312:                           ok = case check_process_time(lists:keysearch(Pid, 1, CT), M, F, T1) of
  313:                                    schedule_time_error ->
  314:                                        test_server:comment("Warning: Failed time ratio"),
  315:                                        ok;
  316:                                    Other -> Other
  317:                                end
  318:                   end, Pids),
  319:     P  = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  320:     ok.
  321: 
  322: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  323: 
  324: %% "Tests combining local call trace and meta trace with call time trace
  325: combo(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  326:     Self = self(),
  327:     Nbc = 3,
  328:     MetaMs = [{'_',[],[{return_trace}]}],
  329:     Flags = lists:sort([call, return_to]),
  330:     LocalTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(5 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  331:     MetaTracer = spawn_link(fun () -> relay_n(9 + Nbc + 3, Self) end),
  332:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, [], [local]),
  333:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  334:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  335:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_count]),
  336:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,seq_r,'_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  337: 
  338:     % bifs
  339:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, [], [local]),
  340:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  341:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, MetaMs, [{meta,MetaTracer}]),
  342:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_count]),
  343:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_memory]),
  344: 
  345:     1 = erlang_trace(Self, true, [{tracer,LocalTracer} | Flags]),
  346:     %%
  347:     {traced,local} =
  348:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, traced),
  349:     {match_spec,[]} =
  350:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, match_spec),
  351:     {meta,MetaTracer} =
  352:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta),
  353:     {meta_match_spec,MetaMs} =
  354:     erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, meta_match_spec),
  355:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [], none),
  356: 
  357:     %% check empty trace_info for ?MODULE:seq_r/3
  358:     {all,[_|_]=TraceInfo}     = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,seq_r,3}, all),
  359:     io:format("TraceInfo=~p\n",[TraceInfo]),
  360:     {value,{traced,local}}    = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfo),
  361:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}   = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  362:     {value,{meta,MetaTracer}} = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfo),
  363:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfo),
  364:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfo),
  365:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfo),
  366:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfo),
  367: 
  368:     %% check empty trace_info for erlang:term_to_binary/1
  369:     {all, [_|_] = TraceInfoBif} = erlang_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, all),
  370:     {value,{traced,local}}     = lists:keysearch(traced, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  371:     {value,{match_spec,[]}}    = lists:keysearch(match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  372:     {value,{meta, MetaTracer}}  = lists:keysearch(meta, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  373:     {value,{meta_match_spec,MetaMs}} = lists:keysearch(meta_match_spec, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  374:     {value,{call_count,0}} = lists:keysearch(call_count, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  375:     {value,{call_time,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_time, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  376:     {value,{call_memory,[]}} = lists:keysearch(call_memory, 1, TraceInfoBif),
  377: 
  378:     %%
  379:     [3,2,1] = seq_r(1, 3, fun(X) -> X+1 end),
  380:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  381:     with_bif(Nbc),
  382:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  383:     TimeB = erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond),
  384:     %%
  385: 
  386:     List = collect(100),
  387:     {MetaR, LocalR} =
  388:     lists:foldl(
  389:       fun ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == MetaTracer ->
  390:               {[X|M],L};
  391:           ({P,X}, {M,L}) when P == LocalTracer ->
  392:               {M,[X|L]}
  393:       end,
  394:       {[],[]},
  395:       List),
  396:     Meta = lists:reverse(MetaR),
  397:     Local = lists:reverse(LocalR),
  398: 
  399:     [?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  400:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  401:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  402:      ?CTT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  403:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  404:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  405:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,4},[3,2,1]),
  406:      ?RFT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,3},[3,2,1]),
  407:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  408:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,3>>),
  409:      ?CTT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  410:      ?RFT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,1},<<131,97,2>>)
  411:     ] = Meta,
  412: 
  413:     [?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_]}),
  414:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[1,3,_,[]]}),
  415:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[2,3,_,[1]]}),
  416:      ?CT(Self,{?MODULE,seq_r,[3,3,_,[2,1]]}),
  417:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,combo,1}),
  418:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[3]}), % bif
  419:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1}),
  420:      ?CT(Self,{erlang,term_to_binary,[2]}),
  421:      ?RT(Self,{?MODULE,with_bif,1})
  422:     ] = Local,
  423: 
  424:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  425:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  426:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 3}, [{Self,1,0,0}], 1),
  427:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, seq_r, 4}, [{Self,3,0,0}], 1),
  428:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{self(), Nbc - 1, 0, 0}], TimeB),
  429:     %%
  430:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  431:     erlang_trace_pattern(on_load, false, [local,meta,call_time]),
  432:     erlang_trace(all, false, [all]),
  433:     ok.
  434: 
  435: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  436: 
  437: %% Tests tracing of bifs
  438: bif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  439:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  440:     M = 5000000,
  441:     %%
  442:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, binary_to_term, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  443:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  444:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_bif, 1}, true, [call_time]),
  445:     Pid = setup(),
  446:     {L, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  447: 
  448:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]}=WB = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,with_bif,1}, call_time),
  449:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000_000 + Us),
  450: 
  451:     B2T = erlang_trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, call_time),
  452:     T2B = erlang_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, call_time),
  453:     io:format("with_bif       = ~p\n", [WB]),
  454:     io:format("binary_to_term = ~p\n", [B2T]),
  455:     io:format("term_to_binary = ~p\n", [T2B]),
  456:     Sum = us(WB) + us(B2T) + us(T2B),
  457:     io:format("Sum  = ~p us\n", [Sum]),
  458:     io:format("Tot1 = ~p us  Diff = ~p us\n", [Tot1, Tot1-Sum]),
  459:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  460:                               T1/2, B2T),
  461:     ok = check_trace_info_ret({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}],
  462:                               T1/2, T2B),
  463: 
  464:     % disable term2binary
  465: 
  466:     2 = erlang_trace_pattern({erlang, term_to_binary, '_'}, false, [call_time]),
  467: 
  468:     {L, _T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_bif(M) end),
  469: 
  470:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, binary_to_term, 1}, [{Pid, M*2 - 2, 0, 0}], T1),
  471:     ok = check_trace_info({erlang, term_to_binary, 1}, false, none),
  472: 
  473:     %%
  474:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  475:     Pid ! quit,
  476:     ok.
  477: 
  478: us({call_time,[{_,_,S,Us}]}) ->
  479:     S*1000_000 + Us.
  480: 
  481: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  482: 
  483: %% Tests tracing of nifs
  484: nif(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  485:     load_nif(Config),
  486:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  487:     M = 5000000,
  488:     %%
  489:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, nif_dec,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  490:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE, with_nif, '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  491:     Pid = setup(),
  492:     {_, Tot1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> with_nif(M) end),
  493: 
  494:     {call_time,[{Pid,_,S,Us}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,with_nif,1}, call_time),
  495:     T1 = Tot1 - (S*1000000 + Us),
  496: 
  497:     % the nif is called M - 1 times, the last time the function with 'with_nif'
  498:     % returns ok and does not call the nif.
  499:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, nif_dec,  1}, [{Pid, M-1, 0, 0}], T1),
  500: 
  501:     %%
  502:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  503:     Pid ! quit,
  504:     ok.
  505: 
  506: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  507: 
  508: %% Tests combining nested function calls and that the time accumulates to the right function
  509: called_function(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  510:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  511:     M = 2100,
  512:     Pid = setup(),
  513:     %%
  514:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  515:     {L, T1} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  516:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T1),
  517: 
  518:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,a_called_function,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  519:     {L, T2} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  520:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  521:                           T1 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  522:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T2),
  523: 
  524: 
  525:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,dec,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  526:     {L, T3} = execute(Pid, {?MODULE, a_function, [M]}),
  527:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M+M, 0, 0}],
  528:                           T1 + (M+M)*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME),
  529:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, a_called_function, 1}, [{Pid, M+M, 0, 0}],
  530:                           T2 + M*?SINGLE_CALL_US_TIME ),
  531:     ok = check_trace_info({?MODULE, dec, 1}, [{Pid, M, 0, 0}], T3),
  532: 
  533:     Pid ! quit,
  534:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  535:     ok.
  536: 
  537: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  538: 
  539: dead_tracer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  540:     TracedMFAs = dead_tracer_mfas(),
  541: 
  542:     Self = self(),
  543:     FirstTracer = tracer(),
  544:     StartTracing = fun() -> turn_on_tracing(Self) end,
  545:     tell_tracer(FirstTracer, StartTracing),
  546:     [1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8] = seq(1, 8, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  547:     Ref = erlang:monitor(process, FirstTracer),
  548:     FirstTracer ! quit,
  549:     receive
  550:         {'DOWN',Ref,process,FirstTracer,normal} ->
  551:             ok
  552:     end,
  553:     erlang:yield(),
  554: 
  555:     %% Collect and check that we only get call_time info for the current process.
  556:     Info1 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  557:     [] = other_than_self(Info1),
  558:     io:format("~p\n", [Info1]),
  559: 
  560:     %% Note that we have not turned off tracing for the current process,
  561:     %% but that the tracer has terminated. No more call_time information should be recorded.
  562:     [1,2,3] = seq(1, 3, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  563:     [] = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  564: 
  565:     %% When we start a second tracer process, that tracer process must
  566:     %% not inherit the tracing flags and the dead tracer (even though
  567:     %% we used set_on_spawn).
  568:     SecondTracer = tracer(),
  569:     tell_tracer(SecondTracer, StartTracing),
  570:     Seq20 = lists:seq(1, 20),
  571:     Seq20 = seq(1, 20, fun(I) -> I + 1 end),
  572:     Info2 = collect_all_info(TracedMFAs),
  573:     io:format("~p\n", [Info2]),
  574:     [] = other_than_self(Info2),
  575:     SecondTracer ! quit,
  576: 
  577:     ok.
  578: 
  579: other_than_self(Info) ->
  580:     [{Pid,MFA} || {MFA,[{Pid,_,_,_}]} <- Info,
  581:                   Pid =/= self()].
  582: 
  583: tell_tracer(Tracer, Fun) ->
  584:     Tracer ! {execute,self(),Fun},
  585:     receive
  586:         {Tracer,executed} ->
  587:             ok
  588:     end.
  589: 
  590: tracer() ->
  591:     spawn_link(fun Loop() ->
  592:                       receive
  593:                           quit ->
  594:                               ok;
  595:                           {execute,From,Fun} ->
  596:                               Fun(),
  597:                               From ! {self(),executed},
  598:                               Loop()
  599:                       end
  600:               end).
  601: 
  602: turn_on_tracing(Pid) ->
  603:     _ = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call,set_on_spawn]),
  604:     _ = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  605:     _ = now(),
  606:     ok.
  607: 
  608: %% We want to trace functions local to this module as well as all BIFs, and for
  609: %% the latter we need to ensure that their modules are loaded.
  610: dead_tracer_mfas() ->
  611:     Modules = [M || {M,_F,_A} <- erlang:system_info(snifs)],
  612:     Whitelist0 = gb_sets:from_list(Modules),
  613:     Whitelist = case code:ensure_modules_loaded(Modules) of
  614:                   {error, Reasons} ->
  615:                       Blacklist = gb_sets:from_list([M || {M, _} <- Reasons]),
  616:                       gb_sets:subtract(Whitelist0, Blacklist);
  617:                   ok ->
  618:                       Whitelist0
  619:               end,
  620:     EligibleSNIFs = [MFA || {M,_F,_A}=MFA <- erlang:system_info(snifs),
  621:                             gb_sets:is_element(M, Whitelist)],
  622:     [{?MODULE,F,A} || {F,A} <- module_info(functions)] ++ EligibleSNIFs.
  623: 
  624: collect_all_info([MFA|T]) ->
  625:     CallTime = erlang_trace_info(MFA, call_time),
  626:     erlang_trace_pattern(MFA, restart, [call_time]),
  627:     case CallTime of
  628:         {call_time,false} ->
  629:             collect_all_info(T);
  630:         {call_time,[]} ->
  631:             collect_all_info(T);
  632:         {call_time,[_|_]=List} ->
  633:             [{MFA,List}|collect_all_info(T)]
  634:     end;
  635: collect_all_info([]) -> [].
  636: 
  637: 
  638: %% OTP-16111: Verify call_time does not increase after traced function returns.
  639: return_stop(_Config) ->
  640:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  641:     %%
  642:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  643:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb,  '_'}, true, [call_time]),
  644:     Pid = setup(),
  645:     {aaa, T1} = execute(Pid, fun() -> aaa()  end),
  646:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  647:     io:format("T1=~p us, US1=~p us\n", [T1, US1]),
  648:     true = (US1 =< T1),
  649: 
  650:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  651: 
  652:     execute(Pid, fun() -> loaded(1000000)  end),
  653:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  654: 
  655:     {bbb,  _} = execute(Pid, fun() -> bbb()  end),
  656:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, US1}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, call_time),
  657: 
  658:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,spinner,  1}, true, [call_time]),
  659:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,quicky,  0}, true, [call_time]),
  660:     {spinner,  T2} = execute(Pid, fun() -> spinner(1000000)  end),
  661:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, SpS, SpUS}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,spinner,1}, call_time),
  662:     Spinner = SpS*1000000 + SpUS,
  663:     {call_time, [{Pid, 1, 0, Quicky}]} = erlang_trace_info({?MODULE,quicky,0}, call_time),
  664:     io:format("T2=~p us, Spinner=~p us, Quicky=~p us\n", [T2, Spinner, Quicky]),
  665: 
  666:     %% Before fix: quicky() got attributed the call_time of its caller spinner().
  667:     true = (Quicky =< Spinner),
  668:     true = (Spinner =< T2),
  669: 
  670:     %%
  671:     P = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  672:     Pid ! quit,
  673:     ok.
  674: 
  675: 
  676: aaa() ->
  677:     aaa.
  678: bbb() ->
  679:    bbb.
  680: 
  681: spinner(N) ->
  682:     quicky(),
  683:     loaded(N),
  684:     spinner.
  685: 
  686: quicky() ->
  687:     done.
  688: 
  689: %% OTP-19269: Verify call_time is reset correctly
  690: %% while traced functions are called.
  691: reset(_Config) ->
  692:     erlang:trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  693: 
  694:     CallTimeReader = fun({P,Cnt,_,_}) -> {P,Cnt} end,
  695:     reset_do(call_time, true, CallTimeReader),
  696:     reset_do(call_time, restart, CallTimeReader),
  697: 
  698:     CallMemoryReader = fun({P,Cnt,_}) -> {P,Cnt} end,
  699:     reset_do(call_memory, true, CallMemoryReader),
  700:     reset_do(call_memory, restart, CallMemoryReader),
  701:     ok.
  702: 
  703: reset_do(TraceType, ResetArg, InfoReader) ->
  704:     %%
  705:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa, 0}, true, [TraceType]),
  706:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb, 0}, true, [TraceType]),
  707: 
  708:     Np = erlang:system_info(schedulers_online),
  709:     Tester = self(),
  710:     Pids = [begin
  711:                 Pid = spawn_opt(fun() ->
  712:                                         receive go -> ok end,
  713:                                         aaa(),
  714:                                         bbb(),
  715:                                         Tester ! {running, self()},
  716:                                         loop_aaa_bbb()
  717:                                 end,
  718:                                 [link, {scheduler,I}]),
  719:                 erlang:trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  720:                 Pid ! go,
  721:                 Pid
  722:             end
  723:             || I <- lists:seq(1,Np)],
  724: 
  725:     %% Wait for all to make at least one traced call
  726:     [receive {running, P} -> ok end || P <- Pids],
  727: 
  728:     {TraceType, AAA1} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, TraceType),
  729: 
  730:     io:format("Reset trace counters for aaa.\n", []),
  731:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa, 0}, ResetArg, [TraceType]),
  732: 
  733:     {TraceType, AAA2} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,aaa,0}, TraceType),
  734:     {TraceType, BBB} = erlang:trace_info({?MODULE,bbb,0}, TraceType),
  735: 
  736:     %% Verify counters are sane
  737:     lists:zipwith3(fun({P, ACnt1}=A1,
  738:                        {P, ACnt2}=A2,
  739:                        {P, BCnt}=B) ->
  740:                            io:format("A1=~p A2=~p B=~p\n", [A1,A2,B]),
  741:                            true = (ACnt1+ACnt2 =< BCnt)
  742:                   end,
  743:                   lists:sort(lists:map(InfoReader, AAA1)),
  744:                   lists:sort(lists:map(InfoReader, AAA2)),
  745:                   lists:sort(lists:map(InfoReader, BBB))),
  746: 
  747:     [P ! die || P <- Pids],
  748:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,aaa, 0}, false, [TraceType]),
  749:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern({?MODULE,bbb, 0}, false, [TraceType]),
  750:     ok.
  751: 
  752: loop_aaa_bbb() ->
  753:     aaa = aaa(),
  754:     bbb = bbb(),
  755:     receive die -> ok
  756:     after 0 -> loop_aaa_bbb()
  757:     end.
  758: 
  759: 
  760: %% OTP-16994: next_catch returned a bogus stack pointer when call_time tracing
  761: %% was enabled, crashing the emulator.
  762: catch_crash(_Config) ->
  763:     Fun = id(fun() -> catch_crash_1() end),
  764: 
  765:     _ = erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [call_time]),
  766:     _ = erlang_trace(self(), true, [call]),
  767: 
  768:     Res = (catch Fun()),
  769: 
  770:     _ = erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]),
  771:     _ = erlang_trace(self(), false, [call]),
  772: 
  773:     id(Res),
  774: 
  775:     ok.
  776: 
  777: catch_crash_1() ->
  778:     error(crash).
  779: 
  780: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  781: %% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  782: %% Local helpers
  783: 
  784: load_nif(Config) ->
  785:     Path = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  786:     case erlang:load_nif(filename:join(Path,"trace_nif"), 0) of
  787:         ok ->
  788:             ok;
  789:         {error, {reload, _}} ->
  790:             ok
  791:     end.
  792: 
  793: 
  794: %% Stack recursive seq
  795: seq(Stop, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  796:     [Stop];
  797: seq(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  798:     [Start | seq(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ)].
  799: 
  800: 
  801: a_function(1) -> a_called_function(1);
  802: a_function(N) when N > 1 -> a_function(a_called_function(N)).
  803: 
  804: a_called_function(N) -> dec(N).
  805: 
  806: with_bif(1) -> ok;
  807: with_bif(N) ->
  808:     with_bif(erlang:binary_to_term(erlang:term_to_binary(N)) - 1).
  809: 
  810: with_nif(0) -> error;
  811: with_nif(1) -> ok;
  812: with_nif(N) ->
  813:     with_nif(?MODULE:nif_dec(N)).
  814: 
  815: 
  816: nif_dec(_) -> 0.
  817: 
  818: dec(N) ->
  819:     loaded(10000),
  820:     N - 1.
  821: 
  822: loaded(N) -> loaded(N, 1.0).
  823: loaded(N, M) when N > 1 -> loaded(N - 1, M * 1.0001);
  824: loaded(_, M) -> M.
  825: 
  826: 
  827: %% Tail recursive seq, result list is reversed
  828: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ) when is_function(Succ) ->
  829:     seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, []).
  830: 
  831: seq_r(Stop, Stop, _, R) ->
  832:     [Stop | R];
  833: seq_r(Start, Stop, Succ, R) ->
  834:     seq_r(Succ(Start), Stop, Succ, [Start | R]).
  835: 
  836: % Check call time tracing data and print mismatches
  837: check_trace_info(Mfa, Expect, Time) ->
  838:     check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, Time, erlang_trace_info(Mfa, call_time)).
  839: 
  840: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, [{Pid, ExpectedC,_,_}] = Expect, Time, TraceInfo) ->
  841:     {call_time,[{Pid,Cnt,S,Us}]} = TraceInfo,
  842: 
  843:     {Mod, Name, Arity} = Mfa,
  844:     IsBuiltin = erlang:is_builtin(Mod, Name, Arity),
  845:     ok = if
  846:         %% Call count on BIFs may exceed number of calls as they often trap to
  847:         %% themselves.
  848:         IsBuiltin, Cnt >= ExpectedC ->
  849:             ok;
  850:         not IsBuiltin, Cnt =:= ExpectedC ->
  851:             ok;
  852:         true ->
  853:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n"
  854:                       " - got call count ~w~p",
  855:                       [Mfa, Expect, Cnt]),
  856:             count_error
  857:     end,
  858: 
  859:     true = (S >= 0),
  860:     true = (Us >= 0),
  861:     Sum = S*1000_000 + Us,
  862:     if
  863:         abs(1 - Time/Sum) < ?R_ERROR; abs(Time - Sum) < ?US_ERROR ->
  864:             ok;
  865:         true ->
  866:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p (Time ~p us)}~n - got ~w "
  867:                       "s. ~w us. = ~w us. - ~w -> delta ~w (ratio ~.2f, "
  868:                       "should be 1.0)~n",
  869:                       [Mfa, Expect, Time,
  870:                        S, Us, Sum, Time, Sum - Time, Time/Sum]),
  871:             time_error
  872:     end;
  873: check_trace_info_ret(Mfa, Expect, _, TraceInfo) ->
  874:     case TraceInfo of
  875:         {call_time, Expect} ->
  876:             ok;
  877:         Other ->
  878:             io:format("Expected ~p -> {call_time, ~p}~n - got ~p~n", [Mfa, Expect, Other]),
  879:             result_not_expected_error
  880:     end.
  881: 
  882: 
  883: %check process time
  884: check_process_time({value,{Pid, M, S, Us}}, M, F, Time) ->
  885:     Sum = S*1000000 + Us,
  886:     if
  887:         abs(1 - (F/(Time/Sum))) < ?R_ERROR ->
  888:             ok;
  889:         true ->
  890:             io:format("- Pid ~p, Got ratio ~.2f, expected ratio ~w~n", [Pid, Time/Sum,F]),
  891:             schedule_time_error
  892:     end;
  893: check_process_time(Other, M, _, _) ->
  894:     io:format(" - Got ~p, expected count ~w~n", [Other, M]),
  895:     error.
  896: 
  897: 
  898: 
  899: %% Message relay process
  900: relay_n(0, _) ->
  901:     ok;
  902: relay_n(N, Dest) ->
  903:     receive Msg ->
  904:                 Dest ! {self(), Msg},
  905:                 relay_n(N-1, Dest)
  906:     end.
  907: 
  908: 
  909: 
  910: %% Collect received messages
  911: collect(Time) ->
  912:     Ref = erlang:start_timer(Time, self(), done),
  913:     L = lists:reverse(collect([], Ref)),
  914:     ?dbgformat("Got: ~p~n",[L]),
  915:     L.
  916: 
  917: collect(A, 0) ->
  918:     receive
  919:         Mess ->
  920:             collect([Mess | A], 0)
  921:     after 0 ->
  922:               A
  923:     end;
  924: collect(A, Ref) ->
  925:     receive
  926:         {timeout, Ref, done} ->
  927:             collect(A, 0);
  928:         Mess ->
  929:             collect([Mess | A], Ref)
  930:     end.
  931: 
  932: setup() ->
  933:     setup([]).
  934: 
  935: setup(Opts) ->
  936:     Pid = spawn_opt(fun() -> loop() end,
  937:                    [link, {max_heap_size, 12000}]),
  938:     1 = erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call|Opts]),
  939:     Pid.
  940: 
  941: execute(Pids, Mfa) when is_list(Pids) ->
  942:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  943:     [P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa} || P <- Pids],
  944:     As = [receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end || P <- Pids],
  945:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  946:     {As, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)};
  947: execute(P, Mfa) ->
  948:     T0 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  949:     P  ! {self(), execute, Mfa},
  950:     A  = receive {P, answer, Answer} -> Answer end,
  951:     T1 = erlang:monotonic_time(),
  952:     {A, erlang:convert_time_unit(T1-T0, native, microsecond)}.
  953: 
  954: 
  955: 
  956: loop() ->
  957:     receive
  958:         quit ->
  959:             ok;
  960:         {Pid, execute, Fun } when is_function(Fun) ->
  961:             %% Make sure we always run with the same amount of reductions.
  962:             erlang:yield(),
  963:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(Fun, [])},
  964:             loop();
  965:         {Pid, execute, {M, F, A}} ->
  966:             erlang:yield(),
  967:             Pid ! {self(), answer, erlang:apply(M, F, A)},
  968:             loop()
  969:     end.
  970: 
  971: %% OTP-17290, GH-4635
  972: apply_bif_bug(_Config) ->
  973:     Pid = spawn(?MODULE, abb_worker, [self()]),
  974:     erlang_trace(Pid, true, [call]),
  975:     erlang_trace_pattern({?MODULE,abb_foo,'_'}, true, [call_time]),
  976:     erlang_trace_pattern({erlang,display,1}, true, [call_time]),
  977:     Pid ! {call, erlang, display, ["Hej"]},
  978:     receive
  979:         done -> ok
  980:     end,
  981:     erlang_trace_pattern({'_','_','_'}, false, [call_time]).
  982: 
  983: abb_worker(Papa) ->
  984:     receive
  985:         {call, M, F, Args} ->
  986:             abb_foo(M, F, Args),
  987:             Papa ! done
  988:     end.
  989: 
  990: 
  991: abb_foo(M,F,Args) ->
  992:     apply(M,F,Args).
